title: My existing profiles are not showing up in the new profile manager

I was excited to see the profile manager finally come out so it would be easier to switch between them. However, only one of my profiles is showing up. The other one is not there, so I still have to use the old method to switch over to it. How can I get my other profile to show up in the profile manager?

title: How Do You Decide Which Firefox Add-ons to Keep or Remove?
content:
Hey everyone,

I‚Äôve been customizing Firefox with a lot of add-ons lately ‚Äî privacy tools, productivity helpers, tab managers, etc.

Sometimes I get overwhelmed trying to decide which ones to keep or disable. Recently, I started using a small online random decision tool ‚Äî https://easydecisionmaker-us.com/ 

‚Äî to help me ‚Äúlet chance decide‚Äù when I can‚Äôt make up my mind between two good options.

It‚Äôs been surprisingly fun and effective!

How do you all decide which extensions stay and which ones go? Do you have a system or just rely on trial and error?
creator: executordelta933

title: login status always saved
content:
One of the recent updates changed Firefox's behaviour. It now remembers my login status to various sites when I close the browser. For example, if I was logged in to facebook when I closed the browser, I will be logged in when I open the browser and navigate to facebook.com. This was not the case until very recently (a few weeks at most). Is there a way to change this?

I have strict privacy settings, and Firefox should delete all cookies when it is closed. There are no 'exceptions'. I have 'always use private mode' checked for history. Also: I haven't changed any settings recently - something changed in Firefox.

Any advice? Thank you.

title: iCloud PW extension effecting my trust of Firefox as a whole
content: I have no idea how 100k people can review an extension labeled ICLOUD PW EXTENSION and you guys can't either remove it for the scam it is or show it has your approval as an extension up to FireFox security standards. 2.7 stars 100k reviews looks like a scam. Simply my feedback. Can't tell if I should trust so I'll never trust it until it's sufficient enough.
